bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dai xia bing 帶下病 , diseases below the belt. Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry ren ni 人溺：產後温一杯飲，壓下敗血惡物。有飲過七日者，過多。恐久 遠血藏寒，令人發帶病，人亦不覺 , “Drinking a cup of warm [urine] following delivery pushes down rotten blood and other malign items. Drinking [warm urine] for more than seven days is excessive. It may cause [the patient] to accumulate cold in her blood over a long period of time, and this will cause her to develop diseases [below] the belt . People are not aware of this”.
